explains: n. 联合企业，财团；<法律>配偶的相互权利；联合

sentences.en: The consortium is a nonprofit group affiliated with the University of Chicago.
sentences.cn: 这个联合会是一个附属于芝加哥大学的非盈利性团体。

sentences.en: The consortium includes some of the biggest building contractors in North America.
sentences.cn: 该联盟包括北美一些最大的建筑承包商。

sentences.en: A consortium plans to build a natural-gas pipeline from Russia to supply eastern Germany.
sentences.cn: 一家财团计划修建一条从俄罗斯向德国东部供应天然气的管道。
